tool_description: Continuously monitors video playback buffer levels and health metrics to detect potential playback issues and inform adaptive streaming decisions.

download_rate_kbps.description: Current segment download rate in kbps

error_messages: Invalid buffer level: current_buffer_seconds must be non-negative
Invalid playback position: playback_position_seconds must be non-negative
Invalid download rate: download_rate_kbps must be positive
Invalid thresholds: Buffer thresholds must be positive with target > critical
usage: Provide current buffer metrics and playback state. The tool analyzes buffer health and provides status indicators for streaming optimization.

buffer_health_status.description: Buffer health status: healthy, warning, critical, empty

buffer_trend.description: Buffer level trend: increasing, stable, decreasing

seconds_to_empty.description: Estimated seconds until buffer is empty

recommended_action.description: Recommended action: maintain, reduce_quality, pause_download, emergency_switch
